Waterdeep's Bloody Class Conflict

About 100 years after Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, the gap between the proletariat and bourgeoisie has grown out of control. The lower class of water deep lacks representation in the government, and suffers from excessive taxation, police brutality, automation of their work, and their children being drafted into the military.

Our adventurers find themselves as free agents, looking to make some coin via their fixer, Jimmy Jim Jim, based out of the Yawning Portal. As they spend time in this setting, they will find themselves choosing a side.
